Head.title: $DFI
Head.desc: Learn about the $DFI coin and its utility, distribution, airdrops and how to acquire DFI.

Header.title: $DFI
Header.desc: Learn about and acquire the $DFI coin.

DFICoinSection.title: $DFI coin
DFICoinSection.desc: The $DFI coin is an integral unit of account in DeFiChain. The DeFiChain Foundation issued roughly 600 million DFI on May 11th, 2020. The current circulating supply (with staking and liquidity mining) is available at
DFICoinSection.disclaimer: Important: DeFiChain is a community project. There was/is no Initial Coin Offering, only free airdrops.

Fees.title: Fees
Fees.desc: Pay for transactions, smart contracts and other DeFi activities.

LoanCollaterals.title: Loan collaterals
LoanCollaterals.desc: Lend or borrow using crypto assets as collateral.

StakingNodes.title: Staking nodes
StakingNodes.desc: Fund a new staking node for just 20,000 DFI.

DeFiCustomToken.title: DeFi Custom Token
DeFiCustomToken.desc: Create a non-refundable personalised DCT (DeFi Custom Token).

BudgetProposal.title: Budget proposal
BudgetProposal.desc: Submit a community budget proposal for 500 DFI (non-refundable).

LiquidityPools.title: Liquidity pools
LiquidityPools.desc: Provide liquidity for the decentralized exchange between crypto assets.

DistributionSection.title: Initial Token Distribution
DistributionSection.desc: Of the 1.2 billion $DFI coins, 49% will be in the initial supply, with the rest issued to masternode holders over time.

chart.desc: Of the initial supply, 49% will be kept by the DeFiChain Foundation. The rest may be distributed to external partners, to fund the initial development.

ExchangeSection.title: Acquiring $DFI coins
ExchangeSection.desc: $DFI coins will be issued to users and partners with an interest in utilizing and participating in the ecosystem.

Exchanges.title: Exchanges
Exchanges.desc: You can now purchase DFI at these select exchanges, with more exchanges to follow.

Staking.title: Staking
Staking.desc: DFI is now available at these select staking platforms.

Developers.title: Developers
Developers.desc: The DeFiChain Foundation gives grants to developers building functionality and dApps on DeFiChain.
Developers.email: For further information, contact us at <0>partners@defichain.com</0>.
